attributes.action: As I am told it is possible to live on £53 Per Week all MP's should receive this instead of expenses.
attributes.additional_details: As I am told it is possible to live on £53 Per Week all MP's should receive this instead of expenses.  Also MP's should receive the current rate of Housing benefit for their second parliamentary home.  I am sure they can find a place on the outskirts of London for this.  Also if MP's have a spair room in their parliamentary home they should also have the same deductions as a JSA claimant.
